name: LightWalker
description:
This is a short experimental semi-idle game revolving around gathering light.

Click the red orb to gather light. Click the gems embedded in structures to start gaining light over time.

This game is in no small part inspired by the games that were part of the recent Incremental Game Jam 2, so if you enjoyed this there's more over there.

Controls:
- WASD to move
- Left mouse button to interact

To change the window resolution, edit settings.ini
